definition[0]: if you are torn, you are unable to decide what to do because you have different feelings or different things that you want
example[1]: Jess was torn by anger and worry.
example[2]: She was torn between her love of dancing and her fear of performing in public.
definition[1]: if a country or group is torn, it is divided because people in it have very different ideas and are arguing or fighting with each other
example[3]: The country was torn by civil war.
example[4]: She spent two months in the war-torn city.
